product_name: Good MoleculesSakura Hyaluronic Acid Boosting Essence
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBoost your skin's hydration levels with the Sakura Hyaluronic Acid Boosting Essence from Good Molecules.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsThree sizes of Hyaluronic Acid soothe surface dry patches while drawing moisture into the skinâ€™s deeper layers for lasting hydration.Natural Sugars Complex and Zinc PCA work throughout the day to boost the skin's ability to retain moisture without feeling greasy.Fermented Sakura Flower and Sake Lees Extracts help smooth the skin texture and maintain a firm, youthful appearance.Item 2635818How To UseDispense into palms and pat into cleansed skin until fully absorbed. Can also be dispensed onto a cotton pad and gently swept over skin. Suitable for daily use. For external use. Avoid eye area.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xylitylglucoside, Betaine, Anhydroxylitol, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xylitol, Zinc PCA, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glucose, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Lees Extract, Tocopherol, Prunus Lannesiana (Sakura) Flower Extract.
how_to_use: Dispense into palms and pat into cleansed skin until fully absorbed. Can also be dispensed onto a cotton pad and gently swept over skin. Suitable for daily use. For external use. Avoid eye area.

reviews.headline: Will buy again and again
reviews.comments: Love this new formula. I think the one star reviews saying bring back the old formula is by a single person with 5 different emails. This provides moisturizing humectants before applying an emollient. No redness, no tackiness, and unscented. Love it

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: This product is so hyrdrating and it doesnt break out my super sensitive skin. I use it to dampen my skin before I add snail mucin and my skin suffers when I dont have it.

reviews.headline: made me break out BAD
reviews.comments: tried this for a month.. made me breakout and here i am 4 weeks later after not using, still dealing with the breakouts that occurred from this product. i don't recommend. cant even return anymore due to the return policy.

reviews.headline: Please bring back old formula
reviews.comments:
Please bring back the old formula. 

Dont fix what isnt broken.

reviews.headline: New formula?
reviews.comments: Before this was reformulated is was a great product, now it's absolutely horrible.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I love the Good Molecules product line.  I have mature with mild roseacea and this product doesn't irritate my skin. It feels great and makes my skin soft hydrated. Live the glass bottle and the flip top to assure no spillage. It is a great price for the size of the bottle. Good Molecules is a great brand, and I always use their products.

reviews.headline: New formulas are terrible
reviews.comments: I used to use a lot of good molecule products and loved them. All the reformulated version are awful?? Even tried to give this one a second chance because I missed the original but broke out like crazy from it AGAIN :(

reviews.headline: Still clearing my skin after breaking out
reviews.comments: Used this once and broke out. I received as a promo and i never used it again. My skin is still recovering from me trying to use products to clear from breaking out due to this product.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Very hydrating & silky, made mu skin feel do much better after being out in the sun.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: This essence is so nice! I use it every morning with the good molecules hyaluronic acid serum. The zinc pca in this reduces my redness and keeps my acne prone skin balanced. It's a great first step before serums for an extra boost of hydration :)

reviews.headline: Beautiful product!
reviews.comments: This really is perfect for summer time! Light but still feels like I'm putting on a product which I love.  I don't wear makeup often during the summer time and it's a perfect clean product that goes well on before my serums and moisturizers

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I added this into my night time routine; skin flooding. This essence is so hydrating,smells so good and beautifully packaged (even better than the higher end products, on the other side of Ulta). I am so happy I choose this. For reference I have extremely dry skin regardless of what season, and use 4 to 5 different toners/essence a night. I apply this on first; dab and pay motion. My last application is my milky toners to lock it in. I wake up in the morning with GLOWY hydrated skin.  Mature dry skin approved. I absolutely love Good Molecules 10/10

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: The old essence was my favorite skin care product ever . It literally made my skin hydrated and glow all day . Now I hate it . It' is the worst product I've ever tried . My face gets extremely dry and Ashy right after using it and it's making my skin drier by the day . Why try to fix something that wasn't broken ???? Now I'm going to have to search for another holy grail skincare product once again .

reviews.headline: Why did they change this product?
reviews.comments: This used to work miracles for me in the winter with my auper dry skin, but whatever they changed in the formula over the last minth or two makes my skin peel like crazy. I'm so bummed.

reviews.headline: reformulation is worse
reviews.comments: i may be in the minority in this but i really dislike this reformulation, it isn't as hydrating as the original version yet it made my skin much more oily and prone to closed comodones. i loved the original toner and bought it for years but will no longer be re-purchasing ðŸ«

reviews.headline: New Formula
reviews.comments: The original Hyaluronic Acid Boosting Essence was my favorite. Literally amazing. I used to get so many compliments on my skin. This new Sakura version is NOT it. Its a whole new formula of mostly water and they even removed a few ingredients ðŸ˜­ I will be returning this ðŸ˜¢

reviews.headline: Like this HA
reviews.comments: This is my first bottle if this HA. I really like it. It absorbs well without leaving a film or stickiness.

reviews.headline: Awesome product
reviews.comments: Get this! Im so amazed at how after just one use I woke up to skin so plump and juicy my (light) acne scars were gone!! Has no noticeable scent and feels super refreshing upon application. Will keep in fridge for hot weather relief. Am very impressed with this product and will try some more from this brand for sure!

reviews.headline: love it!
reviews.comments: I really love this product! leaves my skin  feeling so soft and hydrated. I have sensitive skin and this has been great

reviews.headline: One of my holy grails
reviews.comments: As someone with really dry skin, I love this product!! I used the original formula, so i love this upgrade! Truly no cons. I love layering this with my GM hyaluronic acid serum. Even when i have an occasional breakout, this isn't thick and pore-clogging. It's very lightweight!

faceoff_positive.comments: I added this into my night time routine; skin flooding. This essence is so hydrating,smells so good and beautifully packaged (even better than the higher end products, on the other side of Ulta). I am so happy I choose this. For reference I have extremely dry skin regardless of what season, and use 4 to 5 different toners/essence a night. I apply this on first; dab and pay motion. My last application is my milky toners to lock it in. I wake up in the morning with GLOWY hydrated skin.  Mature dry skin approved. I absolutely love Good Molecules 10/10
faceoff_positive.headline: Love!

faceoff_negative.comments: The old essence was my favorite skin care product ever . It literally made my skin hydrated and glow all day . Now I hate it . It' is the worst product I've ever tried . My face gets extremely dry and Ashy right after using it and it's making my skin drier by the day . Why try to fix something that wasn't broken ???? Now I'm going to have to search for another holy grail skincare product once again .
faceoff_negative.headline: Terrible
